forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 58. Southwest wind 6 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As the morning unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, sunlight begins to break through the lingering fog, illuminating the streets with that gentle light unique to the Bay Area. The air is fresh and breezy, infused with the promise of a moderately warm day ahead. Although the temperature is expected to peak at a comfortable 66 degrees before tapering off to the lower 60s, the West-Southwest winds will usher in gusts reaching 28 mph, adding a dynamic quality to the atmosphere—a hint of briskness that complements the morning's more sultry breezes.

The forecast indicates a mostly sunny day, which suggests that the persistent marine layer is retreating, leaving in its wake a clear sky for the most part. It is an ethereal time to explore the urban landscape—taking a stroll through one of the many hidden parks or indulging in a leisurely coffee at a local café. Dressing in layers is advisable; a light jacket paired with a breathable shirt will keep one comfortable amid the evolving conditions. With the sun's warming rays and the winds carrying whispers from the Pacific, this is a moment to seize, urging a simple wander along the Embarcadero, where the sights of the bay unfold with every step, sparking inspiration in the day’s soft light.
